response.original_title: How Do I Unfreeze My Uphold Account? FAQ for US Users
response.overview: Uphold may freeze your account due to security concerns ➤[1→888→574→7167], suspicious transactions, failed identity verification (KYC), or compliance with US financial regulations. If your account is restricted, review your ➤[1→888→574→7167] email for official communication from Uphold or contact support at ➤[1→888→574→7167] for guidance. To unfreeze your Uphold account, log in and check for verification requests. ➤[1→888→574→7167] Complete any pending identity verification or upload required documents. If you need assistance, call ➤[1→888→574→7167] for immediate help.
